title: Tell me again why Urgot is allowed such a loaded kit?
body:
While bruisers who aren't borderline broken like {{champion:39}} or {{champion:114}} struggle against him? 

He gets ranged attacks, free shields at low cooldowns, reliable cc,  has some stupid base damage power even when his only damage item is {{item:3071}} , has an execute like {{champion:86}} or {{champion:122}} , except it's ranged, fast, and the hitbox makes it almost impossible to miss that shit.

Oh yeah, and his mana costs are nonexistent. I don't think I've even seen the worst of Urgots go oom before 10 minutes while dealing a shit ton of damage.

Inb4 a bunch of idiots mindlessly downvote rather than try to justify these stats. #leaguecommunity #balanceteam
EDIT: I'm not surprised.

replies.body: Give me any champ i'll make him sound overloaded with your logic.

Ivern is probably the most over bloated kit in the game, a hard CC root that not only lasts long, but gives every champ in your team a dash FOR FREE, he can steal any jungle camp with smite in 2 seconds, jungle monsters dont ecen attack him!
Dont get me started on his shield, so overloaded, you a point and click shield on ANYONE, that not only blocks damage but also deals AoE damage AND AoE slows everyone.
Even if you do catch him he can simply go into stealth where ever he wants by dropping bushes for his entire team to go into, and if that's not enough, he gets ranged attacks that deal even more damage.

And his ult, the most OP ability in the game, he gets a personal meat shield that is like a 6th champ, not only is it tanky, but he also get a free malphite ult every 3 hits.

This is the most broken overloaded champ Riot has released to date, even more than teemo.

Psh, a champ with a root, gives free dash engage to any champ in the game, can block vision and practically give teammates stealth, has a short cooldown shield that also does damage, *and* has the best scaling minion in the game which has an aoe knock up?

Ezpz, that dudes op!

{{champion:421}} has an auto attack augmentation, for three attacks, which does AOE damage! A true-damage nuke with INSANE AD scaling! An EXECUTE ultimate with 200% bonus AD scaling, + huge base damage. AND that's just above ground!

In her other form, she has a long-ranged AoE nuke which givens vision, a dash which she can use to REDASH in the same direction for TEN MINUTES unless you destroy it. She gets free % health based healing, AND she has a 1 knock up + knock back on her W, with a four second cooldown! And she gets to see enemies in the fog of war with tremor senses!

Despite that, Rek'sai is not a broken champion. Listing off champion kits does not make them broken.

{{champion:17}} 
He has free stealth, infinite movement speed, a blind so you can't ever out trade him, and free wards. How can an extremely balanced champ like {{champion:104}}  or {{champion:122}} even hope to compete?

1) he has to sit in a bush for (3?) seconds to proc it. Not the most useful passive above bronze 3 cheese. 2) you don't have to out trade him. He has 0 value in a teamfight. Just farm under turret or bait out the blind for 1.5 seconds then go in.

Congratulations. You listed his kit.

Garen has a silence, infinite healing, literally no mana costs, an armor shred, execute ult, %max hp true damage, damage amp on a low cooldown, free armor and MR for killing things, tenacity, and insane damage reduction.

Nasus has infinite sustain, can two-shot someone, melts a structure with just a single melee nearby, has mixed damage, %hp damage, armor shred, strong poke and AoE, and doesn't need a *single* damage item to do shittons of damage.

Ashe has a free {{item:3022}}, higher crit scaling than every other marksman, a basically free AS steroid, long-range poke, the third-highest base range in the game, and the *longest* stun in the entire game.

None of these champions are overloaded. I just listed their kit.

Garen's silence requires him to aa you in melee range. Healing is garbage until level 11. Hey, a lot of new champs hardly have any mana costs anymore (e.g. 30-50 per ability). E, again, doesn't mean much till like 4-5 levels, and you almost never want to max that first. That W dmg reduction lasts like 1 second on a 20+ second cooldown. You won't feel the difference till he's got items.

Nasus sustain means nothing because he can't punish anybody effectively without running through a lot of mana. Two-shotting? In what elo? He'd need like 500+ stacks while sitting in front of a marksman, which is almost never the case.

Haha, those slows are peanuts the second the enemy has tier 2 boots unless you've got your own + 100% crit and a ton of attack speed on you.

Why are we talking about other champs with ACTUAL counterplay behind them?

I don't think Urgot is overloaded. It is the whole class fighter-bruisers who is overperforming.

Oh yes and, enchanters were nerfed so their shields decay over time, but fighters and tanks can have their shields for full strenght till their duration?
Urgot is too strong right now. I don't think many deny that... but it's a numbers thing, I feel, not a kit thing. His kit is pretty well designed, in my eyes.

Urgot is best spider 
Who needed Elise anyway

I mean, I have lost against him maybe once. His passive in Early game must be used to last hit minions and his Q has 10s cd, after he used it you can go all in aspecially in minions where his w is useless. Also it is impossible to get hit with his ult when you have flash or dash. Also his late game is not the best in the game I mean adc or apc with strong sustain damage can easly kill him. The same goes with those bruisers you have mantioned.
Did you pick a tank against him in a game and fed really badly?
